labels: live chat support for your website
name: Get live chat for PrestaShop Website
short_description:
Now get eAssistance Pro live chat plugin for PrestaShop Website and blogs. To get this live chat plugin follow the steps given bellow -

Steps1: Login to your PrestaShop administration
Step 2: Go to Modules from menu bar
Step 3: Select Add a new module
Step 4: Browse eAssistancePro.zip file from your compter and click Upload this module
Step 5: Browse eAssistance Pro Live Chat module in module diretory and Click install 
Step 6: Click Configure
Step 7: Copy the recommended code from https://support.eassistancepro.com/chatcode/recommended.php and paste in text area
Step 8: Select your position left or right and click on Save Settings

To get more information visit https://www.eassistancepro.com/addons/prestashop.php
summary: Get live chat for PrestaShop website
